page.title: 16HOUSING-INSIDE BUNGALOWS
page.content: {Most bungalows}in St Merryn have about 2/3 bedrooms,1 dining room,1 sitting room,1 kitchen,1 bathroom sometimes with a separate toilet. {The bedrooms}are furnished with beds,drawers, cupboards and wardrobes. Most people eat in dining rooms. {The sitting room}is the most popular room,often it has a coal fire, cabinets, probably a settee, some chairs and a T.V. {The kitchen}has a lot of electrical appliances eg. microwaves , cookers, fridges, food mixers and blenders and dishwashers. {In the tiled bathroom}there is 1 bath, a sink and a toilet,with some cupboards under the sink and some scales, a towel rail and sometimes a mirror. Most baths include a shower.
